i18n.description:
This is a functional component that can be used when HTML interpolation is needed.

http://kazupon.github.io/vue-i18n/guide/interpolation.html#basic-usage

i18n-n.description:
This functional component provides a way to use HTML interpolation in pair with number formatting.

http://kazupon.github.io/vue-i18n/guide/number.html#custom-formatting
